item.title: My journey to getting Erasmus Mundus scholarship for SECCLO
item.description: A lot of people asked me about this, so in this post I am sharing with you my experience in getting an Erasmus Mundus scholarship for the SECCLO program. I graduated my bachelor’s Hmm that’s pretty much it on this section. I graduated :) I applied to Australia Awards Scholarship A few months later, I tried applying for a scholarship.

item.title: Things to consider when writing motivation letter for scholarships
item.description: There is no right or wrong in writing a motivation letter. In this post, I merely show you how I wrote mine which got me a scholarship. First things first: Who am I & why should you trust me? I was granted an Erasmus Mundus scholarship to pursue a Master’s degree in SECCLO, co-funded by the Erasmus+ Programme of the European Union.
